ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:59:34 [Issue ID 4000-166362] urn:comicvine:4000-166362 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:27:17. [Issue ID 230710]
ComicInfo.Summary: Plague is spreading, wiping out an entire city while its dying ruler has taken what no human should possess: Hellspawn Necroplasm. What abomination will erupt when the Necroplasm intermingles with the flesh of a dead holy man? Far away, an old "friend" has returned to Covenant and told him of the catastrophe. Now Covenant, together with Gareth the Druid, must travel to the City of Plague and confront the ungodly horror that awaits them.
ComicInfo.Title: Lesion
